unnormalised: Really enjoying these athlete biographies! Makes you appreciate the hard work. Reminds me of that scene in "Chak De! India" about dedication. What a struggle, eh? Did you know Dhyan Chand scored so many goals? Inspiring stuff! My cousin, Rahul, plays kabaddi at IIT Delhi, and he'd love these. Keep sharing, yaar! Next time, do one on P.V. Sindhu.
